Login.Guest.ThanksToIt: Thanks to it, you are able to:
Login.Guest.Option.3: access to a limited set of actions
Login.Guest.Option.4: share machines with other guests to execute process
Login.Guest.LimitExceeded: You have exceeded your daily limit. Contact us via the contact form on the homepage or come back tomorrow
Login.Guest.UnexpectedError: Unhandled error has occurred. Contact us via the contact form on the homepage
Login.Form.Email.Label: Email Address
Login.Form.Password.Label: Password
Login.SwitchToRegisterMessage: Don't have an account? Sign up
Login.Error.4xx: Bad credentials or the user does not exist
Login.Error.5xx: An unexpected server error has occurred. If the problem persists - contact us via the contact form on the homepage
Login.Error.UserNotActivated: User is inactive. Ask the administrator for activation
Login.Error.TenantNotActivated: Tenant is inactive. Ask the administrator for activation
Login.Error.UnexpectedError: Unhandled error has occurred. Contact us via the contact form on the homepage
Login.Error.MicrosoftPopupError: Login with Microsoft account error has occurred. Contact us via the contact form on the homepage
Login.Error.Msal.BadEmail: Your Microsoft account does not have valid email address associated with it.
Login.Error.Msal.BadCookie: Invalid Microsoft login session. Please try again.
Login.Error.Msal.TokenExchangeError: There was a problem exchanging the Microsoft token.
Login.Error.Msal.TokenIssueFiled: There was a problem with logging you in to the application.
Login.Error.TooManyRequests: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
